body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting Car Dealership Support. My name is Daniel Peterson. May I please have your name?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Hello, my name is Kayla Walker.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Kayla. How can I assist you today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: I'm feeling disappointed about the data management system at the dealership.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: I understand, Kayla. Could you please provide your phone number and email address for verification?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: My phone number is seven eight zero - two three four - five six seven eight. And my email is kaylawalker@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for verifying, Kayla. Your feedback is important to us. Is there anything else I can assist you with?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that's all for now. Thank you.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for reaching out, Kayla. Have a wonderful day. Goodbye!
